entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator is comparing configuration keys case-sensitively #88112
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not properly handle lifetimes for return values and 'out' parameters in failing COM methods #88111
  • Avoid emitting code that honors BinderOptions when not specified in binding call #88110
    8.0.0
  • Native crash on System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.4.Tests net8.0-linux-Debug-arm64-Mono_release #88102
  • [RISC-V] Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 #88099
    8.0.0
  • S.R.I.Wasm.PackedSimd API changes #88092
    8.0.0
  • Program throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Release #88091
    8.0.0
  • Define and implement behavior of NativeAOT EventPipe IPC if there's already another runtime in the process #88087
  • JIT: Support FIELD_LIST stack args on more platforms #88086
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #88098
  • [browser][MT] The WebSocket is not connected. #88084
    8.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in tracing infrastructure when build is running ILC while ETW is enabled #88081
    8.0.0
  • Use Initial Executable optimization within native runtime #88076
    Future

Closed

  • Regressions in Math.Min/Max benchmarks #88096
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf pipeline broken with build errors #88108
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #56592
    8.0.0
  • mac m1 using System.Data.Odbc on .net 7 (core) #88007
  • JIT does not promote Span<T> in R2R code #85511
    8.0.0
  • CORINFO_FLG_CUSTOMLAYOUT semantics #71711
    8.0.0
  • TarEntry: link target path checks #78695
  • .NET framework 4.8.1 TLS 1.3 incompatible with .NET 6 TLS 1.3, presumably other versions #87975
    Future
  • [Mono] Intrinsify System.Numerics.Vector and System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128 API's with mini JIT on Arm64 #80566
    8.0.0
  • Frozen Collection Follow-up: Items/Keys/Values properties #86719
    8.0.0
  • Cannot create a CancellationTokenSource with an infinite delay with TimeProvider that is not TimeProvider.System #88000
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WhenAny<TResult>(IEnumerable) inconsistently does not use current scheduler for tasks #87481
  • hi, quesion about coreclr interpreter #88078
  • [iOS] Vector128 and Vector64 GetOne* test failures #87412
    8.0.0
  • [Dotnet 6.0] Timeout error always says "The request was canceled due to the configured HttpClient.Timeout of 100 seconds elapsing", even when timeout is different from 100sec #88074

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix NativeAOT rethrow bug #88113
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion from 6.2.2 to 6.2.4 #88107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #88104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Reenable GCStress WeakReferenceTest #88103
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Remove Vector<T> fallbacks #88101
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • JIT: Enable physical promotion by default #88090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling recursion over fields #88083
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection debugging #88082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [IGNORE] [mono] Add support for SSE1 in JIT mode. #88075
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • Ensure that we can still inline Math.Max and Math.Min on downlevel hardware #88106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ABIStress test hashing padding #88097
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Automatically instrument jiterpreter traces if td->verbose_level > 0 #88053
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [browser][mt] active issues in smoke test #88100
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Disable building of tests with build breaks #88094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add some JIT helper functions to throw common corlib exceptions. #87044
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] The REG_SCRATCH is not conflict with REG_PINVOKE_FRAME. #88029
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Fix a couple of replay bugs #88088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix TimeProvider Timer with Infinity Timeout #88024
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot] Fix native bits build when targeting "cross" architecture iOS platforms #88079
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2210267 #88069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Optimize aggregate info iteration in physical promotion #87997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87933
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Use compGetTieringName for disassembly output #88033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • throw SocketException for Quic transport errors #87208
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Ensure runtime thread for diagnostic server thread #88077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • minor regex cleanup #88026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Updated

  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    blocked, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Workaround for __clear_cache() #88039
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added Utf8.IsValid(bytes) #88004
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adjust the costs for floating-point/simd to better reflect reality #87699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Discard lastIndexMarshalled variable if it is not otherwise used #88060
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #88071
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adopt Microsoft.DotNet.XunitAssert fork #86193
    area-Infrastructure
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • Add hosting test to validate behavior of runtime property set twice #87781
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Convert Volatile to JIT intrinsics #88073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Optimizes vector conversions with AVX512 #87878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • ZipArchive now disposes given stream only once #87982
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • TcpListener should implement IDisposable #88043
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [OSX] When HybridGlobalization mode is on load hybrid icu file #88041
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
